A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I honestly don't understand this movies audience score\, this movie personally blew me away and had a fantastic plot and great character development with older characters and the newcomers. I went to see this movie with a bunch of friends and family and everyone agreed with me that this movie was just awesome! I definitely recommend going to see this! Sure it's very different from any other Star Wars movie in the saga\, but that's what unique about it\, it gives Star Wars a fresh look\, I commend rian Johnson for his work on this movie!
